thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 10 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Electric Connector Technology receives patent licenses

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Electric Connector Technology receives patent licenses

organizations.name: reuters) - electric connector technology co ltd

text:
Jan 11(Reuters) - Electric Connector Technology Co Ltd
* Says it received a patent license (No. ZL 2013 1 0753587.9), regarding low-match signal connector
* Patent valid for 20 years
* Says it received patent licenses (No. ZL 2017 3 0127403.7, ZL 2017 3 0127297.2), regarding electric connectors
* Patents valid for 10 years
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/hEVDys
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
